documents.document: #MundineGreen3.....live on Facebook.
My blind Uncle just called me. Even he thinks Mundine won that fight. #MundineGreen2
Even Mundine haters think that decision was bullshit #MundineGreen2
Foxtel versus Pirates is the real main event tonight #MundineGreen2
While Jessica Mauboy sings to a drowsy crowd, I'll take a moment to get last minute predictions. I'm tipping Choc on points. Who ya got?
For those still alive, Mundine and Green are expected to walk soon.
Someone has already opened a GoFundMe account to cover his legal costs. https://t.co/OVaXTAONyJ
Australian boxing, ladies and gentlemen. https://t.co/233ntgQn58
QUADE COOPER, THE GIANT KILLER!
Twitter is a usually a black hole of negativity. It's good to see everyone change their tune (at least momentarily) for #AFLW
@FNA_Chris Problem is, we have zero evidence to dispute it or back it up.
It's worth noting that the AFL app is not doing score updates for #aflwomens. No stream of matches on LivePass, either.
@Squealers_ Not to mention Quade Cooper is fighting an overweight teenager.
@FNA_Chris @Dan_Attias Jeff Horn can hardly get any publicity and he's fighting Manny fucking Pacquiao.
60 dollarydoos, my friend. That's the same price Main Event charged for Mayweather-Pacquiao. https://t.co/CHIA1kMHVI
I don't care what reproductive organs the players have, I'm just really excited about watching footy again. #AFLWBluesPies
This #MundineGreen2 undercard is atrocious. You'll see better scraps at your local pub.
@incognateo She's clearly a polarising personality. I have never had a bad interaction with her, personally, but that's just me.
@incognateo Certainly not. These days, she's the only Aussie without the full support of fellow Aussies.
@djh_1018 There's more reality in most scripted dramas.
I understand disliking someone's personality, but these people are acting like she shot Bambi. https://t.co/IdG4Iq9KwZ
@stormlandbrand It's case-by-case. Bec would either have to move her family to US or settle for lower-quality training. It's a tough one.
@stormlandbrand My point is, most fighting parents are away from their kids during camp. That doesn't make them a bad parent.
@djh_1018 Which is ridiculous since hundreds of hours get chopped into twelve 40-something minute pieces.
If we held all fighting mothers and fathers to that standard, I guess almost all would be terrible parents. https://t.co/raJd3PI0wL
@djh_1018 Pre-TUF, she was more popular than almost any other Aussie on the UFC roster, though.
The Facebook comments section on this article UFC posted about Bec Rawlings is something else. https://t.co/dJLtbOVskL
It was one of the many reasons I quit voting. https://t.co/ttamJiXQPs
@shawn_w_smith @IanBainMMA I would imagine if UFC didn't at least cover flights many could not afford to attend even if they wanted to.
@shawn_w_smith @IanBainMMA One fighter told me for out of camp media appearances UFC covers flights and one meal per day.
Spoiler: I'm backing the underdog. https://t.co/Gm8fwg90G2
Among fight nerds? Sure. But Mundine-Green has been basically the only boxing match casual Aussie sports fans haveâ€¦ https://t.co/hpLczA2QJL
There's a surprising lack of excitement around Mundine-Green II.
A book about her 22 years of life? That'll be captivating. https://t.co/rJR2qCbyzq
The anti-MMA crusader is in town for a violent prize fight? https://t.co/uBKC4DwdL4
Royal Rumble was on today and I had no idea. I guess I really am #lapsed
Death. That's the worst that can happen, DC. https://t.co/Sex8w07Gqn
@DavePella The only people giving it any attention are those financially incentivised to do so.
@DavePella Its absolutely ridiculous. Incredibly dangerous, too.
@aof_official has turned me into a needy side piece. Please don't wait four-plus years between visits again.
In breaking news, @GeorgePettit almost played an Alexisonfire set with his shirt on #TheOnlyBandEver
My take on #PacquiaoHorn https://t.co/pFtYKvB2Fw
@pinkyknows On a bigger platform, that would've been a real star-making performance for Megan Anderson.
2017 is only 15 days old, but we already have a FOTY frontrunner. #DeGaleJack
Nothing compares to the drama of a fantastic 12 round boxing match. #DegaleJack
@shawn_w_smith 6-4 DeGale, but a lot of swing rounds there.
@shawn_w_smith How do you have it? Scores are all over the place on my feed.
Half way home. DeGale is ahead, but Jack is coming on strong. #DegaleJack
Invicta wraps up just in time for #DegaleJack. Cheers, Megan Anderson.
Aussie fans have always dreamed of a UFC king or queen. Megan Anderson is now the top candidate to become the first champ from Down Under.
Jenny Liou shaved her head to make weight? That's nothin', Cody McKenzie donated a pint of blood to make weight.
"She got a tap, she took a nap, and she got the win." Bravo, TJ.
WHAT IS HAPPENING?!?!
No Reebok logo. Completely unprofessional. https://t.co/78o8CancqL
The interim Invicta featherweight title is contested tonight. The winner will hold a more valuable 145-pound crown than the future UFC champ
Ronda Rousey is worse than all the fighters she finished in under a minute. Makes sense. https://t.co/CHnlMlk0hb
It was depressing. But BJ Penn always dared to be great, and that fearlessness is proving to be a double-edged sword https://t.co/ZsRtRucGFT
Win or lose, nothing good can come of this for ol' Jay Dee Penn.
I know you kill your heroes in prize fighting, but Penn-Rodriguez is just depressing.
Bummed to hear @partingshotmma is no more. It's been a great show over the years, congrats @LynchOnSports, @CarlinBardsley, @MMAdamMartin.
@TheMaximumPower And being made by a man who is stubborn enough to fight them on it.
Pac-Man vs Horn in Brisbane? Count me in.
@Chrisquirk @totsky_stephen 100% a troll job. He does this regularly.
@Chrisquirk I don't really like Meryl Streep movies, so we're even.
How can I go on knowing I will never have a conversation with Meryl Streep about how rad Rumina Sato was?
Meryl Streep doesn't like cage fighting? I am absolutely gobsmacked.
If Garbrandt only plans to defend vs. PPV draws, he won't be fighting anytime soon. https://t.co/VdlANfVlmv
@pinkyknows Bisping vs. Andy Silver in London was great, too. I couldn't put either above Lawler-Condit, though.
Y'all get too wound up by the moronic opinions of these mainstream media dorks. Just laugh, move along, and hope they go away.
@NickUFC Chris Camozzi was busy.
Mikey Bisping could realistically snag fighter, KO, and upset of the year. 2016 really produced a wild and unpredictable 12 months.
Bain vs. Bardsley (presumably for an interim title). With a strong undercard, that fight could sell 750k+ on PPV. https://t.co/ffWGiQbJvV
@JedKMeshew You could pick Anderson Silva's resume to pieces, too. But both knocked off the challengers placed in front of them at the time.
@RebneyMMA @MIKERUSSELLMMA As with everything else in MMA, there's the UFCs side of the story, then there's the truth.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA Not to mention, Brock became the company's biggest star after getting wrecked by Ubereem.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA That's another Rousey hot take going around. Apparently, WWE would have no interest in her now because she lost twice.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA That's an interesting 'what if' because there's a good chance Bad News would've been an MMA fighter in a different era.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA This guy deserves a shot. https://t.co/mL5XNwAYCT
@MIKERUSSELLMMA It's lunacy. Well, at least these fair-weather fans will disappear until the Conor McGregor show rolls into town again now.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA A Ronda Rousey fight was short? That's never happened before. PPV buyers couldn't possibly have seen that coming.
@MIKERUSSELLMMA I imagine the people tweeting these hot takes are the type of fans who spell her name "Rhonda". And are big fans of "Conner"
@MIKERUSSELLMMA People are saying she isn't an icon now? The Rousey revisionist history post-193 is absolutely insane.
@ricketyoldshack What did you think of RTJ 3?
Mirko Cro Cop: Trainer killer & Pokemon Master. https://t.co/lIBx96XU3I

WILD BOYS! https://t.co/yaMBPberZW
Kron is crushing The Crusher. This is nuts.
@shaunalshatti Goldie basically said his goodbyes in the sign-off by thanking the team. But UFC did nothing special for Mike.
@peskyyy Yes. The production team cut to the kids when Miyu lost, too.
He's been put on a leash tonight. Still a few fights to go, though, so I wouldn't rule anything out yet. https://t.co/FRKHAXq7mO
@Chrisquirk Show her the BARUTO fights ;) She'll love it.
#RIZIN2016 - a real heartwarming rom-com. https://t.co/vo6csf0Csr
@DavePella I might be over it by NYE next year.
@andremgeorgiou You and me both, sir. It's stupidity at it's finest.
Me, when BARUTO got eliminated from the tournament. https://t.co/p0iJlpZKxZ
@shawn_w_smith The link is dead :( Give it a listen if it pops up again. He offers basically no advice other than "HEAD MOVEMENT!"
@shawn_w_smith Have you heard Edmond's corner audio from the fight?
@shawn_w_smith I would be willing to bet she doesn't return anytime soon.
I give Hotta a decent chance against Gabi if they let her use that chain.
@shawn_w_smith Fight sports are incredibly cruel. A wild 13 months for Ronda Rousey.
